text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>. 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE>
  </BIBL>; Item 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>deßelben</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>. 
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann-Hühner</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>. 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>. 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>. Item: 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"Fixes applied: (1) Added XML declaration. (2) Closed the broken Johann Arndt <BIBL> before the nested <BIBL> began (nested BIBL is invalid/mistaken here). (3) Moved/added the missing <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> into the Johann Arndt record (it was implied by the trailing 'in 8vo' that actually belonged to that title). (4) Normalized obvious mojibake in the text/FORMAT values to readable forms (e.g., 'B√ºcher'→'Bücher', '8v√≤'→'8vo')."}

<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:

(3) Moved/added the missing <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> into the Johann Arndt record (it was implied by the trailing 'in 8vo' that actually belonged to that title). (4) Normalized obvious mojibake in the text/FORMAT values to readable forms (e.g., 'B√ºcher'→'Bücher', '8v√≤'→'8vo').
